name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D Birthday Live】I'll Be Your Angle Or Yuor Devil #HELLoHALO [CLxtrooDlP8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Kronii, in her angel outfit, thanks the audience on stage with a giant chibi version of herself floating in the background.
A cinematic transition scene featuring chibi Kronii and dark, hellish visuals with wings and fire, shifting the theme from 'Angel' to 'Devil'.
Kronii reappears in her devil outfit, reacting to her transformation and interacting with a chibi Boros clock before preparing for her next performance.
Kronii performs the song 'Vampire' by DECO*27 in her devil outfit.

subtitles.english: Thank you guys, thank you.

subtitles.original: Oh...

subtitles.english: Oh man...

subtitles.original: Bless.
subtitles.english: Bless.

subtitles.original: Love.
subtitles.english: Love.

subtitles.original: Thank you.
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: Wait...
subtitles.english: Wait...

subtitles.original: Wait, I'm the devil?
subtitles.english: Wait, I'm the devil?

subtitles.original: Bro, oh geez, she blind for real for real.
subtitles.english: Bro, oh geez, she blind for real for real.

subtitles.original: What, me? That... that doesn't make any sense.
subtitles.english: What, me? That... that doesn't make any sense.

subtitles.original: What?
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: Hey, come over here.
subtitles.english: Hey, come over here.

subtitles.original: Yeah, you. Yeah, come here.
subtitles.english: Yeah, you. Yeah, come here.

subtitles.original: What are you looking at? Huh?
subtitles.english: What are you looking at? Huh?

subtitles.original: Stupid little thing, huh? Smug, you like that, huh?
subtitles.english: Stupid little thing, huh? Smug, you like that, huh?

subtitles.original: You're... you're just a little wannabe of mine.
subtitles.english: You're... you're just a little wannabe of mine.

subtitles.original: You know, I don't like you. Get... get out of here!
subtitles.english: You know, I don't like you. Get... get out of here!

subtitles.original: God, always want to take the spotlight for some reason. Disgusting.
subtitles.english: God, always want to take the spotlight for some reason. Disgusting.

subtitles.original: Well... I mean, at least I still look pretty damn good.
subtitles.english: Well... I mean, at least I still look pretty damn good.

subtitles.original: Sheesh!
subtitles.english: Sheesh!

subtitles.original: Okay, there we go.
subtitles.english: Okay, there we go.

subtitles.original:
あたしヴァンパイア　いいの？　吸っちゃっていいの？
「もう無理もう無理」なんて　悪い子だね
subtitles.english:
I'm a vampire. Is it okay? Can I suck your blood?
Saying "I can't take it anymore," what a bad child.

subtitles.original:
試したいな　いっぱいいっぱいしたいな
君と僕とで絶頂いけるよ
subtitles.english:
I want to try it. I want to do it more and more.
You and I can reach the climax.

subtitles.original:
ヴァンパイア
Lyrics・Composition: DECO*27
subtitles.english:
Vampire
Lyrics・Composition: DECO*27

subtitles.original:
最低最高ずっと行き来してる
甘くなる不安の果実
subtitles.english:
Going back and forth between the lowest and highest.
The fruit of anxiety that becomes sweet.

subtitles.original:
No more　安静っとして息をしても
いらない　頂ける　受けるだけ
subtitles.english:
No more. Even if I stay still and breathe,
I don't need it. Just take it, just receive it.

subtitles.original:
誰かと居れば　其れを足れば
強がってたって気持ちには逆らえない
subtitles.english:
If I'm with someone, if that's enough,
even if I pretend to be strong, I can't go against my feelings.

subtitles.original:
離れていても　感じてるエモ
繋がってたしかめたら死ねるかも
subtitles.english:
Even if we're apart, I feel the "emo".
If we connect and confirm it, I might die.

subtitles.original:
良いもん　悲しいもん　虚しいもん
君のすべてを喰らうまで　絶叫
subtitles.english:
It's okay. It's sad. It's empty.
Until I devour all of you, scream.

subtitles.original:
あたしヴァンパイア　いいの？　吸っちゃっていいの？
「もう無理もう無理」なんて　悪い子だね
subtitles.english:
I'm a vampire. Is it okay? Can I suck your blood?
Saying "I can't take it anymore," what a bad child.

subtitles.original:
試したいな　いっぱいいっぱいしたいな
君と僕とで絶頂いけるよ
subtitles.english:
I want to try it. I want to do it more and more.
You and I can reach the climax.

subtitles.original: 求めちゃってまたしちゃって　汚れたような感じ
subtitles.english: Seeking, doing it again, feeling like I've become dirty.

subtitles.original: 泣いて忘れたら「はじめまして」
subtitles.english: If I cry and forget, then it's "nice to meet you".

subtitles.original:
愛情を注ぐまで　絶対いけるよ
あたしヴァンパイア　まずはこっちおいで
subtitles.english:
Until I pour out my love, we can definitely make it.
I'm a vampire, first, come here.

subtitles.original: 内緒の想い　洗いざらい　吐き出したなら　まさに裸足
subtitles.english: Secret feelings, if I spill them all, it's just like being barefoot.

subtitles.original:
割り切れないけど　余りじゃない
そっと温めてトドメを
subtitles.english:
I can't divide it, but it's not the remainder.
Gently warm it up and finish it off.

subtitles.original:
繰り返す夜　我儘はタダ
欲張ってまたチャンスを逃すのだ
subtitles.english:
Repeated nights, selfishness is free.
Being greedy and missing the chance again.

subtitles.original:
止まないもしも　叶えたいけど
重なって押しつぶされちゃうのかも
subtitles.english:
Endless "what ifs", I want them to come true, but
they might pile up and crush me.

subtitles.original:
良いもん　悲しいもん　虚しいもん
君のすべてを喰らうまで
subtitles.english:
It's okay. It's sad. It's empty.
Until I devour all of you.

subtitles.original:
良いじゃん　気持ちじゃん
溺れるまで癖になるね　絶叫
subtitles.english:
It's fine. It's about feelings.
It'll become a habit until I drown. Scream.

subtitles.original:
あたしヴァンパイア　いいの？　吸っちゃっていいの？
「もう無理もう無理」なんて　悪い子だね
subtitles.english:

subtitles.original:
君もヴァンパイア　いいよ吸っちゃっていいよ
「もう無理もう無理」だって言わせたい
subtitles.english:
You're a vampire too. It's okay, you can suck my blood.
I want to make you say "I can't take it anymore."

subtitles.original:
君以外では　絶対いけない
ほら絶叫させてよ
subtitles.english:
I can't go with anyone but you.
Come on, let me scream.

subtitles.original: 求めちゃってまたしちゃって　何回目？
subtitles.english: Seeking, doing it again, how many times has it been?

subtitles.original: 毒が見えるような罠の中で
subtitles.english: In a trap where you can see poison.
